name: Parse Game Data
Calculate Schedule Metrics
Split Game Output
Format Schedule CSV
func:
const data = msg.payload;

const csvRow = {
    Date: data.date,
    Person: data.person,
    'Game Score': data.score,
    'Energy Level': data.energyLevel,
    'Task Productivity': data.taskProductivity,
    'Focus Quality': data.focusQuality,
    'Social Engagement': data.socialEngagement,
    'Distraction Level': data.distractionLevel,
    'Overall Productivity': data.overallProductivity,
    'Engagement Score': data.engagementScore,
    'Weighted Productivity': data.calculations.weightedProductivity,
    'Attention Efficiency': data.calculations.attentionEfficiency,
    'Social Balance': data.calculations.socialBalance,
    'Energy Slices': data.gameMetrics.energy,
    'Task Slices': data.gameMetrics.tasks,
    'Focus Slices': data.gameMetrics.focus,
    'Social Slices': data.gameMetrics.social,
    'Distraction Hits': data.gameMetrics.distractions,
    'Timestamp': data.timestamp
};

msg.payload = csvRow;
return msg;

name: Generate Insights
Prepare Game Response
